description: This file defines the CartScreen widget for a Flutter shopping cart interface, including UI layout, state interactions with cart and order providers, and auxiliary widgets for quantity control and cart summary.

classes.name: CartScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays the user's shopping cart with items, total summary, and order placement button.

classes.name: _QtyControl
classes.description: A StatelessWidget providing UI controls for modifying the quantity of an item, including increment, decrement, and remove actions.

classes.name: _SummaryRow
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a label and value for cart summary totals, with optional bold styling.

classes.name: _EmptyCart
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that shows a message indicating the cart is empty with an icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the CartScreen UI including list of cart items, total summary, and order button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for _QtyControl widget with quantity adjustment and delete buttons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for _SummaryRow displaying label and total value.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for _EmptyCart showing an icon and message for an empty cart.
